remarks: Value of operation Q, mapping a vertex v and a nonnegative integer n to the not closed walks v(0) ... v(n) of length n from a fixed vertex v = v(0).  "Not closed" means v(n) =/= v(0).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 27-Sep-2018.)
statement:
numclwwlk.c $e |- C = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` n ) ) $.
numclwwlk.f $e |- F = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( w ` 0 ) = v } ) $.
numclwwlk.g $e |- G = ( v e. V , n e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( ( w ` 0 ) = v /\ ( w ` ( n - 2 ) ) = ( w ` 0 ) ) } ) $.
numclwwlk.q $e |- Q = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( ( V WWalksN E ) ` n ) | ( ( w ` 0 ) = v /\ ( lastS ` w ) =/= v ) } ) $.
numclwwlkovq $p |- ( ( X e. V /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( X Q N ) = { w e. ( ( V WWalksN E ) ` N ) | ( ( w ` 0 ) = X /\ ( lastS ` w ) =/= X ) } ) $.
